string.text:
A military armored suit made for assault operations. Provides outstanding protection against full metal jacket rounds and fragmentation damage without reducing the wearer's mobility. Vulnerable to armor-piercing rounds.
 
%c[0,170,170,170]COMPONENTS:
 
%c[0,170,170,170]ENVIRNOMENTAL PROTECTION:
 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Toxicity res. %c[0,170,170,170]34 C1 ppm eq.
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Thermal / acid. %c[0,170,170,170]13 kw / m2
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Psy protecion %c[0,170,170,170]ineligible
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Electricity res. %c[0,170,170,170]458 kV

%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Torso: %c[0,170,170,170]IV
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Shoulders: %c[0,170,170,170]IV

%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Feet: %c[0,170,170,170]IV

A standard military overcoat that will keep the wearer warm during rain and strong winds. It offers little to no protection but allows a single armour attachment by default.
 
%c[0,170,170,170]PROPERTIES:
 
%c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] usable for: %c[0,170,170,170]heavy armor repairs (+22%)
 
%c[0,170,170,170]ENVIRNOMENTAL PROTECTION:
 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Toxicity res. %c[0,170,170,170]26 C1 ppm eq.
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Thermal / acid. %c[0,170,170,170]3,5 kw / m2
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Psy protecion %c[0,170,170,170]ineligible
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Electricity res. %c[0,170,170,170]597 kV

A long and padded overcoat. It it enforced with special padding around the torso and head which allows it to serve as low grade anti-anomaly armor. It is best used in conjunction with a gasmask or closed-breathing helmet. It allows the application of a single armour attachment by default.
 
%c[0,170,170,170]PROPERTIES:

A long and thick overcoat with extra padding for added protection. Can serve as low grade anti-anomaly armor but is best used in conjunction with a gasmask or closed-breathing helmet. It allows the application of a single armour attachment by default.
 
%c[0,170,170,170]PROPERTIES:
 
%c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] usable for: %c[0,170,170,170]heavy armor repairs (+28%)

A titanium helmet with a cloth exterior that comes with pockets for additional steel armor pieces and and armor face mask. In the Zone Sphere The gas mask's armored valve apparatus is of custom desing and presumably never went into mass production, however it supports a standarized side mounting for single 40mm PMK filter. System also features a military-issue 1PN93-1 night vision device. M12 is the heaviest combat helmet available in the Zone, where it is normally used as a part of a combination that includes PSZ series Spetsnaz body armor. Desing idea for this helmet is: provide maximum head protection at the cost of increased weight.
 
%c[0,170,170,170]PROPERTIES:
 
%c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] usable for: %c[0,170,170,170]heavy armor repairs (+20%)
 
%c[0,170,170,170]COMPONENTS:

%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Neck: %c[0,170,170,170]III

A standard steel russian army helmet without any additions. Provides no protection against anomalies or radiation, but can deflect bullets - effectively preventing damage to head areas it covers. This helmet was never particularly popular in the Zone, except for use in brief armed conflicts between factions.
 
%c[0,170,170,170]PROPERTIES:

Envirnoment protection helmet which has been unmounted from a SSP-99 Ecologist full-body protection system along with complete, closed respiratory system. It features an airtight visor intended for complete insulation from outside envirnoment conditions. Its intended use may very well be in combination with military suits for operations in highly anomalous areas.
 
%c[0,170,170,170]PROPERTIES:

A modern, miniaturized version of classic EO-19 PBF gasmask. Desing purpose is to allow breathing air filtered from radioactive particles and poisonous substances while not reducing the overal mobility of the user. Updated EO-20 particulate filters undergone a significant miniaturization while receiving an actual boost to anti-radiation proeperties by placing lead elements in the apparatus. Of note is that while it allows to mostly forget about inhalation-based radiation poisoing, the mask is very likely to fail agains high-toxicity envirnoment of anomalies and is very likely to attain irreversible damage when exposed to them for any longer time. It also provides very limited physical damage protection and durability.
 
%c[0,170,170,170]PROPERTIES:
 
%c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] usable for: %c[0,170,170,170]medium armor repairs (+11%)

%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Neck: %c[0,170,170,170]none

A simple piece of material sewn to form a mask to put on face. Stalkers have a habit of having such masks constantly on them - as even thou geiger counter may not indicate local concentration of radioactive particles, in the Zone they are litterally everywhere. Althou the mask is suited perfectly for such purpose it will fail to protect from greater concentrations of radioactive particles. Moreover as the material gets gradualy soaked with them, protection level becomes worse up to the point when mask itself becomes radioactive and dangerous. For this reason it is advisable to take spare masks when venturing outside bases for prolonged excursions.
 
%c[0,170,170,170]PROPERTIES:
 
%c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] usable for: %c[0,170,170,170]medium armor repairs, weapon maintenance (+4%)

PMK set is build around a single, multi-layered, 40 mm breathing filter placed on the left side of valve apparatus. This solution increases weight and reduces mobility but it also provides good protection to radiation even when damaged or congested. Reinforced construction makes it more durable to physical stress at the cost extra weight. The PMK mask was designed for use by the Ukranian Spetsnaz and never went into mass production. For some reason the supply batch which has ended up in the Zone has a standard-issue 1PN93-1 nvd installed on it by default, which indicates its presumably elite-squads designation.
 
%c[0,170,170,170]PROPERTIES:

A modern, quality, western-made combat helmet with build in breathing filtered respiratory system. The helmet is designed to provide a squad leader with strategic superiority over the enemy via its many scanners and satellite communications devices, which have not been installed in this particular helmet. Comes with multi-layered Kevlar protection and armored elements to user from physical damage. As it is made entirely from composites it does not conduct electricity, rising users overall electrical resistance.
 
%c[0,170,170,170]PROPERTIES:

This lightweight stalker bodysuit is made by Freedom craftsmen. The suit's fabric is treated with Horizon, a special solution developed by the faction by trial and error to increase resistance to anomalies. Like the Sunrise suit, the Wind of Freedom comes with built-in body armor and armour attachment modules.
 
%c[0,170,170,170]PROPERTIES:
 
%c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] usable for: %c[0,170,170,170]heavy armor repairs (+32%)
 
%c[0,170,170,170]ENVIRNOMENTAL PROTECTION:

%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Electricity res. %c[0,170,170,170]866 kV

%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Feet: %c[0,170,170,170]IIIA

This modern version of the Duty bodysuit is better suited for stalker recruits who are used to lightweight suits. Unlike the PSZ series, this suit provides good protection against anomalies while also being capable of stopping a pistol bullet. The suit cannot be modified with an armour attachment module, but may be upgraded with a combat support system instead.
 
%c[0,170,170,170]PROPERTIES:
 
%c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] usable for: %c[0,170,170,170]heavy armor repairs (+34%)
 
%c[0,170,170,170]ENVIRNOMENTAL PROTECTION:

This modern military armored suit is designed for assault operations in anomalous areas. Mainly desighned for Spetsnaz Units on high risk operations. Comprises a PSZ-12p heavy military armored suit, built-in compensation suit, and an anomalous protection bodysuit. The armor provides excellent protection against bullet and fragmentation damage, without greatly reducing the wearer's mobility. Comes with built-in armour attachment modules.

This bodysuit, intended for conducting research in the Zone, combines a closed-cycle respiratory module and an external isolation coating, resulting in excellent protection from anomalies. Due to poor protection from physical impact, the suit is not a good defense against bullet and fragmentation damage. Comes with a built-in armour attachment module.

This item comprises military PS5 series body armor with beryllium sputter modified for use in the Zone. Designed for assault operations in highly radioactive areas, it is ineffective in areas of high anomalous activity. The suit makes its way to stalkers through the military, who exchange it for loot. Comes with built-in armour attachment modules.

This DIY stalker bodysuit is a combination of a bodysuit of twin-layered rubberized cloth with plexiglass lining and built-in body armor. Despite the fact that the body armor is incapable of protecting the wearer from even pistol bullets, the suit enjoys great popularity due to its low cost and modification potential. Comes with built-in armour attachment modules.

This stalker bodysuit with reinforced body armor made by Freedom craftsmen represents a good compromise between combat and anomaly protection. The built-in body armor comprises armor plating and ten Kevlar layers, capable of stopping a pistol bullet. The suit uses the relatively expensive Sovereign compound for anomaly protection. Comes with an armour attachment module.

This early model of the Duty bodysuit is the Spetsnaz PSZ-9 body armor modified for the Zone. The suit is capable of stopping a rifle bullet, however, this level of protection comes at the cost of its weight, bulkiness and virtually non-existent anomaly protection. The suit cannot be modified with an armour attachment module, but may be upgraded with a combat support system.

Once used as standard by Clear Sky assault squads, after the faction’s elimination this armor serves as a reminder that even an excellent protective bodysuit cannot guarantee your safety if you're on the wrong side of the perimeter. The armor is capable of stopping a pistol bullet, while the wearer is also well protected from anomalies. Comes with a built-in armour attachment module.

An experimental sample of a military exoskeleton. Was never mass-produced due to extraordinary cost and some design flaws. Despite this, it is in demand due to its ability to take on the weight of all carried equipment, and therefore small batches are made in underground facilities outside Ukraine. The exoskeleton suit is a very expensive suit and anyone who wears one of these should be avoided unless you have a death wish.

A SSP-99 chemical protection suit specifically designed for the zones conditions. It is used primarily by scientific expeditions and the eco-stalkers who co-operate with them. It has an intergrated air filtering and conditioning system offering excellent protection against radiation and chemical exposure, includes an anomaly suppression system, and uses a fabric which offers excellent heat and electrical resistance. It isn't designed for combat, so it provides neither bullet or splinter protection. Includes a container capable of holding 2 artifacts.

High quality modified SSP-99 suit. It provides increased body protection from bullet and splinter damage. It is designed for the guards working with scientific expeditions. It provides good protection from radiation and biological anomalies. It is resistant to chemically aggressive environments and other effects dangerous to the body. Includes a container capable of holding 2 artifacts.
